Detailed Description

This class contains a single alignment fragment from a contig to the reference. For a multi-part mapping of a contig to the reference, an object of this class represents just a single fragment from that alignment.

Member Function Documentation

void AlignmentFragment::indelCigarMatches ( const CigarMap &  nmap,
const CigarMap &  tmap 
)

check if breakpoints match any cigar strings direct from the reads This is important in case the assembly missed a read (esp normal) that indicates that there is an indel. Basically this function says that if assembly calls a breakpoint and it agrees with a read alignment breakpoint, combine the info.

Parameters:
const CigarMap reference containing hash with key=chr_breakpos_indeltype, val=tumor count
const CigarMap reference containing hash with key=chr_breakpos_indeltype, val=normal count
